alert.note: Alert for Forrest; Jones; Lamar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued December 14 at 3:47PM CST until December 14 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR NORTHERN FORREST, SOUTH CENTRAL JONES AND CENTRAL LAMAR COUNTIES... At 347 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Hattiesburg, Petal, West Hattiesburg, Purvis, Oak Grove, Pine Ridge, Sunrise, Eastabuchie, Macedonia and Baxterville. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
